hero.description: Register your company in Uzbekistan without renting an office. Real cadastral address, physical representative, e-ijara and Didox registration — all included.

painPoints.title: Do you recognize yourself?
painPoints.description: You're a foreign company or non-resident wanting to enter the Uzbekistan market. Seems simple: register an LLC, open an account, start working.
painPoints.item1Desc: Dozens of listings without clear terms, unclear who to trust, high risk of fraud
painPoints.item2Desc: Mass registration addresses lead to rejections when opening a bank account
painPoints.item3Desc: Rejections for VAT registration due to unverified addresses
painPoints.item4Desc: Renting a real office from 4-6 million UZS/month just for a registry entry
painPoints.item5Desc: 3-5 hours for self-registration in Didox and e-ijara
painPoints.item6Desc: Without a physical representative, any inspection becomes a problem
painPoints.conclusion: As a result, you spend weeks searching, money on mistakes, and nerves on bureaucracy — instead of doing business.

benefits.title: Three things you get
benefits.item1Desc: Every location has a physical representative from 10:00 to 20:00, ready to confirm your company's presence.
benefits.item1Highlight: Not a "ghost" or mass registration address
benefits.item2Desc: No chaos on OLX. You choose a plan, pay a deposit — and in 2 days you have all documents.
benefits.item3Desc: A real office costs 4-6M UZS/month. UrAdres — from 990,000 UZS. Pay only for what you need.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.quote1: We were opening a representative office from Kazakhstan and were afraid the process would take a month. With UrAdres, everything was done in three days. The address passed the bank check on the first try.
testimonials.quote2: We tried to find an address ourselves through OLX — spent two weeks and got rejected by the tax office. We contacted UrAdres, and in two days everything was ready.
testimonials.quote3: We have e-commerce from UAE, and we needed an Uzbek legal address to work with local suppliers. Everything was done remotely. Very clear and transparent service.

product.title: What is
product.description1: UrAdres is a next-generation legal address rental service for foreign companies and non-residents in Tashkent.
product.description2: Unlike typical "mass registration addresses", each client gets an individual premises with physical representative presence — real trading activity is conducted on the territory.
product.locationsDesc: Ground floors and basements in prestigious areas
product.feature1: Official cadastral address for LLC / Sole Proprietor registration
product.feature2: Registration in Didox and e-ijara (Ijara Soliq)
product.feature3: Compliance with all Uzbekistan legislation requirements
product.feature5: Mail receipt and forwarding (in Standard and Business packages)
product.feature6: Dedicated representative at the address (in Standard and Business packages)

pricing.title: Choose the right package
pricing.description: Transparent prices, no hidden fees. 10-15% discount for annual payment.
pricing.startDesc: For those who only need a legal address for registration
pricing.startFeature1: Cadastral address for LLC / Sole Proprietor
pricing.standardDesc: For sole proprietors and companies without VAT who need physical presence
pricing.standardFeature3: Mail receipt and forwarding — up to 10 items/month
pricing.discount2: Referral program: bring a client — get 10% discount
pricing.fulfillmentDesc: Subscription fee + pay per delivery. Fixed in contract.

cta.title: Have questions?
cta.description: Write to us on Telegram — we'll respond within 15 minutes and help you find the right address for your task.
cta.tagline: UrAdres — official address. Real presence. Fast start.

footer.company: Service provided by LLC "Ustores", Republic of Uzbekistan, Tashkent, Shaykhantakhur district, Djangokh massif, 37

about.title: UrAdres
about.description: We are a legal company with over 10 years of market experience. We help foreign companies and non-residents legally register business in Tashkent in 1-2 days.
about.whoDesc1: Ustores is a professional legal company specializing in providing legal address rental services for business in Tashkent.
about.whoDesc2: Over more than 10 years of work, we have helped hundreds of companies from Russia, Kazakhstan, UAE, Europe and other countries successfully enter the Uzbekistan market.
about.whoDesc3: Our team consists of experienced lawyers and business registration specialists who know all the intricacies of Uzbekistan legislation.
about.missionDesc1: We believe that business registration should be simple, fast and transparent. Our mission is to eliminate bureaucratic barriers and help entrepreneurs focus on developing their business.
about.missionDesc2: Unlike typical "mass registration addresses", we provide an individual approach to each client.
about.value1Desc: We work only within the legal framework. All services are fully legal.
about.value2Desc: Every client is important. Always in touch and ready to help.
about.value3Desc: Processing in 1-2 days, responses — within 15 minutes.
about.offer1Desc: Official cadastral address for LLC or Sole Proprietor registration.
about.offer2Desc: A representative is present at each address from 10:00 to 20:00.
about.offer3Desc: Full registration in Didox and e-ijara included in the price.
about.offer5Desc: Assistance in opening a bank account.
about.why1: Over 10 years of successful market experience
about.clientsDesc: We work with companies of all sizes — from startups to international corporations
about.requisitesExperienceValue: Over 10 years in legal services market

payment.title: Payment methods
payment.description: Convenient payment methods for residents and non-residents of Uzbekistan. Transparent prices, no hidden fees.
payment.method1Desc: Invoice payment for legal entities. Suitable for foreign companies.
payment.method2Desc: Fast payment through popular Uzbekistan payment systems.
payment.method3Desc: Cash payment at our office in Tashkent. Receipt provided.
payment.method4Desc: Payment in BTC, ETH, USDT and other cryptocurrencies.
payment.step1Desc: Choose the right plan: Start, Standard or Business
payment.step2Desc: Pay a 3-month deposit to receive the address
payment.step3Desc: Get the lease agreement and cadastral number
payment.step4Desc: Pay monthly or get a discount for annual payment
payment.info1: Deposit is refundable upon contract termination
payment.info2: 2 weeks to register company after receiving address
payment.info3: All prices exclude VAT (except Business plan)
payment.info4: Contract available in Russian and English
payment.discount1Desc: Pay for services for a year upfront and get a significant discount. No need to remember monthly payments.
payment.discount2Desc: Bring a client — get 10% discount on the next month. Number of referrals is unlimited.

guarantees.title: Your safety is our priority
guarantees.description: We guarantee legality, transparency and reliability of our services. We work officially and are responsible to every client.
guarantees.what1Desc: We sign an official lease agreement. Contract in Russian and English.
guarantees.what2Desc: All addresses are real premises. No virtual or fictitious addresses.
guarantees.what3Desc: A representative is present at each address from 10:00 to 20:00.
guarantees.what4Desc: Services fully comply with Uzbekistan legislation.
guarantees.what5Desc: Addresses pass inspections at banks and tax authorities.
guarantees.what6Desc: We guarantee registration in Didox and e-ijara within the plan.
guarantees.others1: Hundreds of companies at one address
guarantees.others2: No one on site during inspection
guarantees.refundDesc: If for any reason you decide to terminate cooperation, we will refund the deposit in full (minus the used period) within 10 business days after contract termination.
guarantees.refundNote: Important: Refund is subject to no outstanding debt and return of all documents.

contacts.title: Contact us
contacts.description: We'll answer all questions and help you find the right address. Usually respond within 15 minutes.
